Class: ConnectAppContext

ConnectAppContext

new ConnectAppContext(version, accountSid, sid)

Initialize the Twilio.Api.V2010.account.ConnectAppContext
Parameters:
Name Type Description
version V2010 Version that contains the resource
accountSid sid The account_sid
sid sid Fetch by unique connect-app Sid

  • rest/api/v2010/account/connectApp.js, line 548

Methods

fetch(callbackopt) → {Promise}

Fetch a ConnectAppInstance
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
callback function <optional>
 Callback to handle fetched record
Source:
  • rest/api/v2010/account/connectApp.js, line 571
Returns:
Resolves to fetched ConnectAppInstance
Type
Promise

update(opts, callbackopt) → {Promise}

Update the ConnectAppInstance If a function is passed as the first argument, it will be used as the callback function.
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
opts object | function ...
Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
authorizeRedirectUrl string <optional>
 URIL Twilio sends requests when users authorize
companyName string <optional>
 The company name set for this Connect App.
deauthorizeCallbackMethod string <optional>
 HTTP method Twilio WIll use making requests to the url
deauthorizeCallbackUrl string <optional>
 URL Twilio will send a request when a user de-authorizes this app
description string <optional>
 A more detailed human readable description
friendlyName string <optional>
 A human readable name for the Connect App.
homepageUrl string <optional>
 The URL users can obtain more information
permissions connect_app.permission <optional>
 The set of permissions that your ConnectApp requests.
callback function <optional>
 Callback to handle updated record
Source:
  • rest/api/v2010/account/connectApp.js, line 620
Returns:
Resolves to updated ConnectAppInstance

Promise
